trans-unit.source: Sets the initial, pop-up, and reshow durations of a ToolTip

seg-source.mrk: Sets the initial, pop-up, and reshow durations of a ToolTip

target.mrk: Sets the initial, pop-up, and reshow durations of a ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: Flag that specifies which duration value will be set:

seg-source.mrk: Flag that specifies which duration value will be set:

target.mrk: Flag that specifies which duration value will be set:

trans-unit.source: $TTDT_AUTOMATIC (0) - Set all three delay times to default proportions. (see remarks)

seg-source.mrk: $TTDT_AUTOMATIC (0) - Set all three delay times to default proportions.

target.mrk: $TTDT_AUTOMATIC (0) - Set all three delay times to default proportions.

trans-unit.source: $TTDT_RESHOW (1) - Time it takes for subsequent ToolTip windows to appear as the pointer moves from one tool to another

seg-source.mrk: $TTDT_RESHOW (1) - Time it takes for subsequent ToolTip windows to appear as the pointer moves from one tool to another

target.mrk: $TTDT_RESHOW (1) - Time it takes for subsequent ToolTip windows to appear as the pointer moves from one tool to another

trans-unit.source: $TTDT_AUTOPOP (2) - Time the ToolTip window remains visible if the pointer is stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle

seg-source.mrk: $TTDT_AUTOPOP (2) - Time the ToolTip window remains visible if the pointer is stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle

target.mrk: $TTDT_AUTOPOP (2) - Time the ToolTip window remains visible if the pointer is stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle

trans-unit.source: $TTDT_INITIAL (3) - Time the pointer must remain stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle before the window appears

seg-source.mrk: $TTDT_INITIAL (3) - Time the pointer must remain stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle before the window appears

target.mrk: $TTDT_INITIAL (3) - Time the pointer must remain stationary within a tool's bounding rectangle before the window appears

trans-unit.source: The default delay times are based on the double-click time. The autopop time will be ten times the initial time and the reshow time will be one fifth the initial time.

seg-source.mrk: The default delay times are based on the double-click time.
The autopop time will be ten times the initial time and the reshow time will be one fifth the initial time.

target.mrk: The default delay times are based on the double-click time.
The autopop time will be ten times the initial time and the reshow time will be one fifth the initial time.

trans-unit.source: For the default double-click time of 500 ms, the initial, autopop, and reshow delay times are 500ms, 5000ms, and 100ms respectively.

seg-source.mrk: For the default double-click time of 500 ms, the initial, autopop, and reshow delay times are 500ms, 5000ms, and 100ms respectively.

target.mrk: For the default double-click time of 500 ms, the initial, autopop, and reshow delay times are 500ms, 5000ms, and 100ms respectively.

trans-unit.source: If the $iDuration flag is set to $TTDT_AUTOMATIC, use a positive value of $iTime to specify the initial time, in milliseconds. Set $iTime to a negative value to return all three delay times to their default values.

seg-source.mrk: If the $iDuration flag is set to $TTDT_AUTOMATIC, use a positive value of $iTime to specify the initial time, in milliseconds.
Set $iTime to a negative value to return all three delay times to their default values.

target.mrk: If the $iDuration flag is set to $TTDT_AUTOMATIC, use a positive value of $iTime to specify the initial time, in milliseconds.
Set $iTime to a negative value to return all three delay times to their default values.

trans-unit.source: Add a tool to the tooltip control

seg-source.mrk: Add a tool to the tooltip control

target.mrk: Add a tool to the tooltip control

trans-unit.source: set the time for how long the tooltip displays, to 1500 ms

seg-source.mrk: set the time for how long the tooltip displays, to 1500 ms

target.mrk: set the time for how long the tooltip displays, to 1500 ms

trans-unit.source: Retrieve and display the time that the tooltip displays

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve and display the time that the tooltip displays

target.mrk: Retrieve and display the time that the tooltip displays
